title: How to learn Javascript ?
content: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language JavaScript is the programming language of the Web javascript is easy to learn.
ponit1: It's a scripting or programming language that allows you to implement complex features on web pages.
ponit2: It is the third layer of the layer cake of standard web technologies.
ponit3: JavaScript on the client side for webpage behavior, often incorporating third-party libraries.
titleEnd: Perfect for learning how the javascript works, prototyping a new idea, or creating a demo to share online.
